name: Clash of Football Legends 2017
description:
Create your own player:

Suggest whom you would like to play in the comments and we will add it in the updates. Play for your favorite country and score goals in this exciting football game.
Exciting matches
Choose a football team and participate in tournaments to become a champion. Train your football-possession skills, master the situation and become a winner. Can you become a Legend of football?
Download for free and show everyone your ball possession skill!

Features:

14+ football teams, choose any
Bleed the player, train the punch, jump and run speed
Three game modes
Friendly game, find yourself a worthy opponent
Cup, win in 15 teams and get the champion's cup, but remember that to become the best, get the Global Elite Cup
For a knockout, be the best of all or take off from the competition, remember that the further you go, the more difficult the opponent

Tips and tricks:

Game Clash of Football Legends 2017 allows you not only to enjoy playing, but also teach you to build strategies for winning a football match. For a more effective game, train the player's skills. Each player has unique characteristics, choose yourself the right one. You like to be always faster than others, then choose a player who can run fast. To be a good goalkeeper, you need to be able to jump, there is such a character. If you like to score goals from a distance, then look for a player with a well-trained shot.

Future plans:

In the new versions of the game Clash of Football Legends 2017 will be a set of additional skills for players.
Write your wishes in the comments, what would you like to see in this game.
Set it! Play it! And be a football champion!
This game in the style of Head Soccer, Tiny Soccer, Puppet Soccer
